name: Eldritch Onslaught
description:
This was a student project made with the Unity Engine. Please leave your feedback so I can improve for future projects!

Eldritch Onslaught is a Shoot'em Up Bullet Hell Game where you control a lone spaceship, fighting against waves of hostile alien creatures. Use your reflexes to dodge a barrage of enemies and projectiles, and shoot down as many foes as possible. Survive as long as you can and get the highest Score in this endless battle against eldritch threats.

  • 4 enemy types with varied shooting patterns.
  • 20 waves of gradually increasing difficulty
  • A Boss that shows up at the end of each iteration. Can you kill it before it retreats, and boost your Score?
